My application was crush here is the logCat

and as for the login page add also the logo in like the sign up page but without the same functionality (three clicks)
as for the lines Sign Up / Login i want you add an animation while swiching between sing up and login

and for the reminder sertting and when i tryed to set a sart time of the reminder notification i didn't receive the notification , i rather dont you use a stat and enda time reminder , just use a normal timing reminder for exemple if set to recieve a notifcation in 5:25 pm it should send me a notification in that time or multiple times just like the picture that i've sent you
i rather you to use for exemple another fragment jus like the image that i've uploaded to you previously and i want you to
and ther is another problem in the graphs in the statics page i want to see a dynamic data not static for exemple if consume a dink it will shos me my consumation in the graph if not it should show an empty consumation (none ) for exemple (just to explain you the logic) i consume in this day two times for exemple at 2 pm and 5pm ehen i ll go to the grap in D section i should see the consomation at 2 and 5 pm and it not show anything in the other hours beacause i didn't consume in theme ,,, if i cousum it will show the consumation if i don't i will not

great , but there is an issuie not big is about went i run the up it shows me the dashboard at first withe the water animation efect untill here every thing is fine but when i go to another page for exemple statics and when i go back to the dash board the animation it stops
second issu in the statics page there is no graph thet shows me the consomation same as allof the D W M Y i want graphs shows the dayli consumation like n the pictures those i've uploaded to you
ther is one thing i want you add is under the Dring type i wnat you show each drink withe its color withe its consumation count and it precentage
and i want you add the notification functionalitie for exemple i want to add a section in the setting named Reminder that allow the user chose which to receive a anotification that reminds hime to drink wanter and he can also use or custume his own notification message also add a section that allows the user shose the notification sound from its phone

inhance the desingn of tips by removing the background image gradinent and make it as the other pages's background and fix the that the images of each tip doesn't show up and fix the the bubble progress bar animation efect becaus when i open the app it works but whent i change and go back to the dashcboeard the bubbles animation effect stopps and fix also the graph becaus i when i consume water my today consomation wasn't sho up in the static page and in the graph
